The eighth generation of Dajian.
He was called the South Gate Chan master of Rizhou.
There was one Dharma heir he produced.
He was named Fengxuan Yanzhao of Ruzhou.

source_sentence: 大鑒之七世曰汝州西院思明禪師。
translation: The seventh lineage of Dagan was named Siming Chanshi of the West Hall in Ruzhou.
There was one Dharma heir he produced.
He was known as Guijing of Hiṅgyang, Yingzhou.
